name: Unexpected Item in Gifting Area
description:
An arcade-rhythm game made for the TriJam #200 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-200)

The jam theme: Expect the unexpected

You control Santa's conveyor belt operation to organise the presents and control their quality. Sometimes mistakes happen, we've all put bombs on assembly lines accidentally, I'd like to think.

Controls:

Left Click - Push left piston

Right click - Push right piston

Space (Hold) - Overhead pipe suction

I used some free assets for sounds and fonts.

Credits:

Sounds:

Piston Push - https://freesound.org/people/Sheyvan/sounds/568290/

Earn Point - Excerpt from https://freesound.org/people/eZZin/sounds/545857/

Lose Sound - https://freesound.org/people/suntemple/sounds/253174/

Pipe Suck Sound - https://freesound.org/people/longor/sounds/648873/

Font:

Press Start - https://www.1001fonts.com/press-start-font.html
